import React from 'react'; import { Eye, Brain } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ExpertiseSection = () => { return (

My Expertise

Oculoplastic Surgeon

Board-certified oculoplastic surgeon with 9 years of experience in oculoplastic, orbital & lacrimal surgery.

Specializations:

  • Reconstruction of ptosis, entropion, and facial nerve palsy
  • Treatment of malignant eyelid tumors and orbital tumors
  • Orbital decompression surgery
  • Repair of blowout fractures
  • Dacryocystorhinostomy

AI Researcher

Dedicated to transforming healthcare through innovative AI technologies in ophthalmology.

Research Areas:

  • Image recognition for disease classification
  • Facial diagnosis of Grave's orbitopathy
  • Blink tracker in blepharospasm
  • Classification of anterior segment diseases

Tech Stack:

  • Python, PyTorch
  • iOS app development
  • Data analysis and visualization tools
Learn More About Me
); }; export default ExpertiseSection;
